title: ‘The Mandalorian’ Gave Us Everything We Wanted | The Watch
description:
We break down the finale of ‘The Mandalorian’ and reflect on why this piece of ‘Star Wars’ content worked where others failed (1:39). Plus: a special shoutout to the show's score (26:47) and what the success of the Disney+ product means for streaming networks like Netflix and Amazon (43:14).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Sean Fennessey

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
